Text:
Sorry to disappoint you jusb1066, this ain't no spam. I have chosen among the books available and sorted the spam out. I hate it just as much as you. Of course some authors are sponsored by a poker-site, but that is something you just have to take! 
With other downloads you'll often find links included to one poker-site or the other. "Get 100$ for free" and such. Nothing like that in this download.

Period.
As said above; SPAM - NO THANKS!
I can confirm that this is NOT spam. Nice work, thanks! I'll be seeding.

This is actually a well put together package! Thanks to the poster. The guy claiming pokerspam is a fish. We also call them calling stations, or ATM's, as they just love to give you chips. :)

Get this package if you want to learn to play poker well.
Forgot to mention, come play me on Pokerstars.com same screen name.
Glad you liked it! And well... C U at pokerstars ;)
seeders plz

looks nice, can't wait to read the books, and i'll be seeding, though i think the best way to improve your play is by fliping cards not reading =)
all in...
Cant get the thing to open. it's listed as an .rar file, can anyone help
To open rar--files...Use the program, stuffit expander if are a Mac-user or IZarc for pc. Both are free...

Good Upload,

thanks!!!!!!
Im new at this but my avast says VIRUS in poker pro.....

Looking at the torrent since i posted last comment,it is a hell of a lot of work for someone to partake for no reward.Thank you very much for the massive endeavour.
Am hoping that the virus warning was indeed a so called false positive...

Thanks for this, I've learned alot about NL with this collection.  If I make it to the WSOP then ill have you to thank/blame =p

Thanks!

Thanks for this great package. I just tought i'd let you know, that Doyle brunson's super system is missing 2 pages in the no limit hold em chapter. You can find the entire book here: http://www.scribd.com/doc/39123/Doyle-Brunsons-SuperSystem

Thanks again!

correction:: naaah...this one is missing the same pages. someone fucked up scanning this thing :( 

Still a great upload!
